Instruction: Pit the black olives if necessary.
In a food processor, combine black olives, capers, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, and lemon juice.
Pulse until the mixture forms a coarse paste.
While pulsing, drizzle in the extra virgin olive oil until well combined.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Transfer the tapenade to a serving dish.
Serve with toasted baguette slices or crackers.
